content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE claim made by Meeropol in the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE historical development illustrated by the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE limitation of Meeropol's argument in the excerpt.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
